articles.title: Mars rock: Red meteorite sells for $4.3 million at auction
articles.description: A meteorite that is the largest known piece of Mars on Earth sold at a Sotheby’s New York auction Wednesday.
articles.content:
CNN —
A meteorite that is the largest known piece of Mars on Earth has sold for a hammer price of $4.3 million to an anonymous bidder at a Sotheby’s New York auction Wednesday.
Known as NWA 16788, the meteorite weighs 54 pounds (24.5 kilograms), mass... [3272 chars]
